item.title: NEWS UPDATE! If you are still using The Eldritch Build, it is strongly recommended that you upgrade to the VOID Build.
You should have recived an email explaining in detail how to upgrade. If you don't see it or can't find it, check your junk mail. You will have until May 1st to upgrade.
IMPORTANT! After May 1st, the "Eldrich Repository", Builds, and Wizard will be deleted and replaced with "Kayn's Repository", the VOID build, and "Kayn's Wizard".
VOID Skin/Build updates were last made on April 3 2018. VOID Source updates were last made on March 19 2018.
Please email "kaynfiretvguru@gmail.com" for any issues you have with your build.
